CustomField.description: Red - Guaranteed risk that deliverables will be missed, late Yellow - Deliverables are behind schedule, but there is a clear plan to mitigate risk Green - On schedule, little or limited risk
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Red - Guaranteed risk that deliverables will be missed, late Yellow - Deliverables are behind schedule, but there is a clear plan to mitigate risk Green - On schedule, little or limited risk
CustomField.label: Risk Status
